menuList.medalImg: background-repeat: no-repeat; background-size: cover; background-position: center center; background-image: url('/img/icon/medal/def_4_34.png');
menuList.medalContent: 热爱中国共产党教育，传承革命精神，践行新时代价值观，积极开展参与少先队主题活动

menuList.medalImg: background-repeat: no-repeat; background-size: cover; background-position: center center; width: 70%; height: 70%; background-image: url('/img/icon/medal/def_4_14.png');
menuList.medalContent: 入校即静，入座即学，早午读养成良好阅读习惯，课前、课上、课后认真好学，遵守课堂纪律，总体学习表现良好。

menuList.medalImg: background-repeat: no-repeat; background-size: cover; background-position: center center; width: 70%; height: 70%; background-image: url('/img/icon/medal/def_4_7.png');
menuList.medalContent: 热爱祖国、热爱集体，不做有损集体的不良行为。

menuList.medalImg: background-repeat: no-repeat; background-size: cover; background-position: center center; width: 70%; height: 70%; background-image: url('/img/icon/medal/def_4_20.png');
menuList.medalContent: 牢记“校园六做到”，课间教学楼内避免快速奔跑，与人交流文明有礼。

menuList.medalImg: background-repeat: no-repeat; background-size: cover; background-position: center center; width: 70%; height: 70%; background-image: url('/img/icon/medal/def_4_25.png');
menuList.medalContent: 眼操时间保质保量，不占用眼操时间处理学习事务，养成良好用眼好习惯。

menuList.medalImg: background-repeat: no-repeat; background-size: cover; background-position: center center; width: 70%; height: 70%; background-image: url('/img/icon/medal/def_4_28.png');
menuList.medalContent: 课间操出退场快静齐，做操整齐有序，集体精神风貌良好

menuList.medalImg: background-repeat: no-repeat; background-size: cover; background-position: center center; width: 70%; height: 70%; background-image: url('/img/icon/medal/def_4_21.png');
menuList.medalContent: 周一至周五按要求穿校服。服装整洁佩戴红领巾、校卡。

menuList.medalImg: background-repeat: no-repeat; background-size: cover; background-position: center center; background-image: url('/img/icon/medal/hwhc97npouaq9sl00w1mej16.png');
background-repeat: no-repeat; background-size: cover; background-position: center center; width: 70%; height: 70%; background-image: url('/img/icon/medal/def_4_29.png');
menuList.medalContent: 见到领导、老师、客人主动打招呼，问好。

menuList.medalImg: background-repeat: no-repeat; background-size: cover; background-position: center center; background-image: url('/img/icon/medal/def_4_34.png');
menuList.medalContent: 积极参与红领巾服务岗位

menuList.medalImg: background-repeat: no-repeat; background-size: cover; background-position: center center; width: 70%; height: 70%; background-image: url('/img/icon/medal/def_4_26.png');
menuList.medalContent: 遵守《小学生守则》，《中小学生日常行为规范》，一周一主题（校会、班会），校会安静有序，学会倾听；班会组织有序，积极参与、讨论活跃、效果良好。

menuList.medalImg: background-repeat: no-repeat; background-size: cover; background-position: center center; width: 70%; height: 70%; background-image: url('/img/icon/medal/def_4_26.png');

background-repeat: no-repeat; background-size: cover; background-position: center center; width: 70%; height: 70%; background-image: url('/img/icon/medal/def_4_3.png');
menuList.medalContent: 根据教育主题和本班特色品牌，开展主题班会、中队或活动，并有上传方案、报道、登记表等资料为佐证
